thread.title: Incomes rise across S.F., except for African Americans
thread.title_full: Incomes rise across S.F., except for African Americans - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Joaquin Palomino
title: Incomes rise across S.F., except for African Americans
text:
Photo: Scott Strazzante, The Chronicle San Francisco NAACP President Amos Brown angrily addresses the income disparity between African Americans and the city’s other races at a Board of Supervisors’ meeting in City Hall. San Francisco NAACP President Amos Brown angrily addresses the...
As the vast majority of San Franciscans have watched their incomes rise amid an explosion of wealth that has reshaped the city, African Americans have seen their earnings decline. San Francisco NAACP President Amos Brown angrily addresses the income disparity between African Americans and the city’s other races at a Board of Supervisors’ meeting in City Hall. San Francisco NAACP President Amos Brown angrily addresses the...
As the vast majority of San Franciscans have watched their incomes rise amid an explosion of wealth that has reshaped the city, African Americans have seen their earnings decline.
